DOC.brief_summary: The intrauterine device ( IUD ) safe , highly effective , long act , reversible form contraception . The postpartum period important moment contraceptive intervention ; however many barrier woman obtain birth control postpartum . The use IUD immediate postpartum set offer many advantage consider safe , risk expulsion appear high interval insertion . Previous study show rate expulsion copper IUD postplacental period range 1-14 % 6-12 month , study levonorgestrel IUD postplacental period document rate expulsion 24 % 12 month . While study relate copper IUD use ring forceps operator 's hand placement IUD , publish study investigate immediate postplacental levonorgestrel IUD insertion utilize manufacturer 's inserter IUD placement . The investigator therefore ask question , difference expulsion rate levonorgestrel copper IUDs place post-placentally provider undergo standardized training , use standardized insertion technique , patient level characteristic control randomization ? The investigator propose perform prospective cohort trial compare rate expulsion levonorgestrel copper IUD 3 month postpartum place uterus within 10 minute delivery placenta , use standardize technique ( placement ring forceps operator 's hand ) provider undergo formal didactic skill train . The investigator hypothesis levonorgestrel IUD high rate expulsion compare copper IUD . Additional objective include comparison rate complete IUD expulsion , partial IUD expulsion , unrecognized expulsion , complication , IUD continuation , pregnancy , satisfaction . Additionally , investigator document natural history location IUD within uterus place immediate postpartum period , utilize ultrasound 24 hour , 6 week , 3 month postpartum , good understand relationship position IUD subsequent expulsion .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Levonorgestrel IUD Copper IUD Placed Immediate Postplacental Period : A Prospective Cohort Study
